boofcv.alg.tracker.combined

Class PyramidKltForCombined<I extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<I>,D extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<D>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.alg.tracker.combined.PyramidKltForCombined<I,D>

  • public class PyramidKltForCombined<I extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<I>,D extends boofcv.struct.image.ImageGray<D>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Pyramidal KLT tracker designed for CombinedTrackerScalePoint.

      • performTracking

        public boolean performTracking(PyramidKltFeature feature)
        Updates the track using the latest inputs. If tracking fails then the feature description in each layer is unchanged and its global position.
        Parameters:
        feature - Feature being updated
        Returns:
        true if tracking was successful, false otherwise
